pr_title: Ensure domain_name setting for AD realm is present

timeline.message:
Ensure domain_name setting for AD realm is present

We would only check for a null value and not for an empty string so
that meant that we were not actually enforcing this mandatory
setting.
This is another take at #61859 . Moved the validation to the setting
itself as we would use it's value in SessionFactory.ldapServers to
build the LDAP URL before the existing valdation actually happened
in ActiveDirectorySessionFactory. This would throw an LDAPSDK
exception before we can validate and throw an IAE.
Cause one has to forget the same test every time they raise the same PR

timeline.bodyText: You should be able to use RealmSettings.affixSetting instead here, which will make it a tiny bit shorter.
timeline.author: tvernum
